doc.previous: where is an interpolated precision that takes the maximum precision over all recalls greater than
doc.after: An alternative is to derive an analytical function by assuming a particular parametric distribution for the underlying decision values For example a binormal precision recall curve can be obtained by assuming decision values in both classes to follow a Gaussian distribution 10
